lead_paragraph: Five Kenyan-based athletes from South Sudan who were named in the first Olympic refugee team on Friday have pledged to use this year's Rio Games to showcase the talents of refugees.

headline.print_headline: Jubilant Refugee Athletes Pledge to Take Rio Chance
headline.main: Jubilant Refugee Athletes Pledge to Take Rio Chance

snippet: Five Kenyan-based athletes from South Sudan who were named in the first Olympic refugee team on Friday have pledged to use this year's Rio Games to showcase the talents of refugees....
